page.title: 07WORK SURVEY
page.content:
FROM THE SURVEY THE FOLLOWING FACTS WERE OBTAINED: 1:THE AVERAGE LENGTH OF WORK PER WEEK =35 HOURS 2:THE AVERAGE AMOUNT OF DAYS WORKED PER WEEK=5 DAYS 3:ALMOST EVERYONE EMPLOYED WORKS IN THE MORNING AND AFTERNOON BUT VERY FEW WORK AT NIGHT (UNLESS SHIFT WORK) 4:THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE WORK INDOORS
5:A GREAT NUMBER OF WORKERS TRAVEL TO THEIR JOB WITH VERY FEW NOT TRAVELLING AT ALL 6:AROUND HALF OF THE EMPLOYERS PROVIDE TRANSPORT FOR WORKERS 7:THOSE EMPLOYERS WHO DO NOT PROVIDE TRANSPORT PAY THE TRAVELLING EXPENSES 8:THE MOST POPULAR MODES OF TRANSPORT ARE CAR,BUS ON FOOT. 9:THE MAJORITY OF WORKERS WORK INDEPENDENTLY.
